title: Hint
text: Calculate the initial acceleration using Newton's second law. Use this acceleration to find the time it takes to reach a specific velocity. Consider the effect of decreasing mass on acceleration and time.

title: Steps
text: Step 1: Calculate the initial acceleration using Newton's second law and the given thrust and mass. Step 2: Use the acceleration to find the time it takes for the rocket to reach a velocity of $$120$$ $$\frac{km}{h}$$. Step 3: Discuss qualitatively how the decreasing mass affects acceleration and time. Step 4: Clearly show all calculations and units.
